definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Predatorsx were a threat to the herd.
sentences.chinese: 食肉動物對牧羣是個威脅。

sentences.english: Then the grass-eating animals died of hunger.
sentences.chinese: 然後食肉動物死於飢餓。

sentences.english: Bulldogs were also used for protection against other carnivorous wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 鬥牛狗也用於保護人們免遭其他食肉動物的傷害。

sentences.english: Lions and tigers are flesh-eating animals.
sentences.chinese: 獅子和老虎是食肉動物。

sentences.english: The agency kills foxes, badgers and other predators.
sentences.chinese: 他們殺死狐狸，獾和其他食肉動物。

sentences.english: Especially large, sharp canine characterizes the carnivorous animals.
sentences.chinese: 大而尖利的犬齒是食肉動物的特徵。

sentences.english: Entire skeletons of ancient creatures including predators like the saurichthys, pictured, were discovered
sentences.chinese: 完整的古代食肉動物魚龍化石被發現，有圖有真相。

sentences.english: Do you think predators are dangerous and need to be avoided?
sentences.chinese: 你是否覺得食肉動物非常危險，需敬而遠之呢？
水生食肉動物的海上巡邏。

sentences.english: We'd better go and see the carniverous animals.
sentences.chinese: 我們最好去看食肉動物。

sentences.english: The agency kills foxes, badgersf and other predators.
sentences.chinese: 政府捕殺狐狸，獾和其他食肉動物以保護家禽。

sentences.english: It is because their meat stinks.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲食肉動物的肉很臭。

sentences.english: Panda's are classified as carnivores but they mainly have a diet of an herbivore .
sentences.chinese: 大熊貓被歸爲食肉動物，但它們飲食更像食草動物。

sentences.english: It is thus possible that the same was applicable to Mesozoic predators as well.
sentences.chinese: 於是中生代的食肉動物也可能是這樣。

sentences.english: An animal of the family Canidae, especially a dog.
sentences.chinese: 犬科的各種食肉動物，如澳洲野犬。

sentences.english: As they rode away he watched the animals eat the meat of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 騎馬離開時，他看到食肉動物正在喫死者身上的肉。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
